com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class SearchClusterComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.SearchClusterComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollectionComponent.CollectionChangeAware, SolrClientFactory

    public class SearchClusterComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements SolrClientFactory, CollectionComponent.CollectionChangeAware
    Provides access to the Solr servers associated with a given collectionId.
